ComicInfo.Summary: Sam & Twitch are warned off of the Culver case by NYPD Internal Affairs. They ignore the warning and look for the paramedics to question only to find them "sutured up". Later, across town, they "interview" Officer Kenny Osborne at gunpoint. Meanwhile, Jeremiah "Sharpie" Euden nearly claims another victim when Suture interrupts his work and kills him. Later, Sharpie's body makes an appearance.
ComicInfo.Title: Tombs
ComicInfo.StoryArc: "Curse of the Spawn" Blood and Sutures
